Establish a sterile zone.sentence: The surgical team cleans the designated area with antiseptic solution.
Establish a sterile zone.subject: The surgical team

Establish a sterile zone.sentence: The surgical team lays down sterile drapes around the perimeter of the area.
Establish a sterile zone.subject: The surgical team

Establish a sterile zone.sentence: The surgical team ensures that all instruments are sterilized before placing them in the sterile zone.
Establish a sterile zone.subject: The surgical team

Establish a sterile zone.sentence: The surgical team verifies that all personnel entering the sterile zone are wearing appropriate sterile attire.
Establish a sterile zone.subject: The surgical team

Establish a sterile zone.sentence: The surgical team marks the boundaries of the sterile zone to prevent contamination.
Establish a sterile zone.subject: The surgical team
Establish a sterile zone.object: the boundaries of the sterile zone
